name: Brotherhood United
description: Pick your guns, grab your beer and blast your way through hordes of enemies on this run and gun game as a member of the Brotherhood who leaves no friend behind. Show your enemies that no one messes with the Brotherhood. Unite the Brotherhood !
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7, Windows 8.1, Windows 10 Processor: Intel or AMD Dual Core CPU Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: (Integrated): Intel HD Graphics or AMD (formerly ATI) Radeon HD Graphics (Discrete): Nvidia GeForce 9600 GT or AMD Radeon HD 2400 DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 80 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7, Windows 8.1, Windows 10 Processor: Intel core I5 or AMD FX-6300 Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: Dedicated Nvidia Geforce graphic card or dedicated ATI graphic card DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 80 MB available space
